title: JSON logging cannot be activated on log handlers
body:
### Describe the bug

JSON logging is only supported on default log file. Should be configurable on all handlers

### Expected behavior

JSON log output on configured handler

```
# Does not work. Need to fill bug with Quarkus
quarkus.log.handler.file.JSON_FILE.enable=true
quarkus.log.handler.file.JSON_FILE.json=true
quarkus.log.handler.file.JSON_FILE.path=/data/log/server.log
quarkus.log.handler.file.PLAIN_FILE.enable=true
quarkus.log.handler.file.PLAIN_FILE.json=false
quarkus.log.handler.file.PLAIN_FILE.path=/data/log/plain_server.log
quarkus.log.category."com.mycompany.mycode".handlers=JSON_FILE,PLAIN_FILE
```

### Actual behavior

file handler is active but logs in plain text format

### How to Reproduce?

see above

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

linux

### Output of `java -version`
